cgcloud__Job_List__c.name: cgcloud__Job_List__c
cgcloud__Job_List__c.description: Stores the job lists that are generated from non-standard job definition lists.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

cgcloud__Description_JDL__c.description: Description of the job definition list.

cgcloud__Valid_From__c.description: Date from which the entry is valid.

cgcloud__Valid_Thru__c.description: Date until which the entry is valid.

cgcloud__Visit_Date__c.description: Visit of the call to which the job list is magnetized.

cgcloud__Visit_Template__c.description: Visit template that's assigned to the activity.

cgcloud__Visit__c.description: Visit to which the job list is magnetized.
